title: Collaboration with the center for nursing
context: [ยง304A-1407] Collaboration with the center for nursing. The University of Hawaii school of nursing and dental hygiene, the state board of nursing, other schools of nursing within the State, professional nursing organizations, employers in the healthcare industry, and labor unions representing nurses and healthcare workers shall collaborate with the center for nursing and provide workforce data to the center for nursing when requested. [L 2006, c 75, pt of ยง2]
